snippet: After a scandal in the Department of Veterans Affairs last year, the Obama administration wants to help military veterans gain easier access to health care, disability and educational benefits.
abstract: Obama administration, speaking on Veteran's Day, urges Congress to implement various improvements to veterans benefits, including changes in healthcare, education and care for homeless veterans following 2014 scandal in Department of Veteran Affairs.
lead_paragraph: After a scandal in the Department of Veterans Affairs last year, the Obama administration wants to help military veterans gain easier access to health care, disability and educational benefits.

headline.main: White House Seeks to Ease Veterans’ Access to Care
headline.print_headline: White House Seeks to Ease Veterans’ Access to Care

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
